title: Why do People hate Bard so much?
body: Today I learned I had Bard in my champ pool for what ever reason, I probably just bought the potato sack and forgot about him. I was just in a norms mid queue and saw one of my own team mates ban him on purpose. Now I'm kinda confused on how far people's hatred for bard can really go...

replies.body: Since Bard is meant to be support, he probably assumed you were making a troll pick and didn't want to throw a game. And to be fair, I wouldn't want to see my own teammate with a Bard mid either.
Bruh I was trying to him support :(

you should know that bard is support
very obvious...... so common sense
not try to offense you but don't pretend to be dumb,
just play seriously. they prevent trolls so that why maybe they ban him or they just have a bad experience with bard or against it
No... I'm serious... I was trying to play him as a support...

bard is one the great supports
they should ban blitz, braum, rakan or other annoying cc passive support champs
banning bard is not helping for real

I'm a Bard main, but I don't think he belongs mid. I'm not a fan of banning my temmate's picks personally, but it makes sens to me that somebody would do so. 

I know some high-level streamers occasionally wreck with him in solo lanes, but his passive loses a ton of luster if you're forced to farm with him, his heal won't do anything against many real mid lane champs, and he's really hard to get a solo kill with. I like the idea of being able to portal gank in either direction, but overall, meh.

Okay, I was trying to play him support, the role he is supposed to be played in. I finally got to play him in ONE game and did fairly decent with a KDA of 2/3/13 with over 50 Chimes!!! I realized he does some serious damage with just a Watchers and a Lich Bane though.
Oh, he's a great support at the moment. No good reason for your teammate to ban him. Auto+Q+Electrocute is hilariously strong in the early game, and portal ganks are hella fun.
Smash that like button if you cri every time

He is very hard to play well, people dont understand him, and he is sort of a troll pick at low ELO.

If people do that shit, you lock in graves support and wait for them to panic.
